title: Last Chance
description: Ava goes to the hottest werewolf club looking to let loose. As a human, she knows a werewolf's scent can temporarily chase away the pains of her illness. Ava seeks relief from the constant pressure in her head caused by a growning tumor. Her carefree night out soon turns into much more than she bargained for. She receives an offer that seems too good to be true, but can she trust a complete stranger?.Peter has drifted the last few years through life. As alpha of the pack, he devotes all of his time to the pack and his business. The rest of his time is spent holed up in his home. He longs for his mate, but she has yet to make an appearance in his life. Though when that day comes, he is determined to never let her get away.This is short story with adult content. Available on smashwords.https://www.smashwords.com/books/view...New version released 6/26/14
author: H. Carlin
